channel.title: How do i make a normal 508 a 508 hd?
channel.description: Ok i got a hd client but there are NO GOOD HD SOURCES OUT THERE they are either got no features or are loaded with crap and millions of errors but i have some good normal 508s i used the search button and looked at tut section and theyres no tuts to make a normal 508 a 508 hd tonypker said that he could but he didnt want to confuse anyone and hes banned so i cant ask him. The server which i want to make a hd is rubiks scape 508 so what im looking for is a tut that tells me how to convert a 508 to 508 hd (link needed) or a brilliant 508 hd source with no errors and lots of features Thanks!!! P.S i just tried dragonscape hd and a lot of errors came

item.title: How do i make a normal 508 a 508 hd?

@ranger_squad wrote:

Andy89898:

Yh i know hot to do that but how do i get the source? any perticular programs where i can click get source or somthing i dont care if its compilicated. I REALLY NEED ONE LOADS OF PEOPLE LIKE CP AND I WOULD BE LIKE A GOD TO THEM.

That insults me.

Read the second one on the left.
